July 18, 1903 D Shirebrook Contest
Shirebrook Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Shirebrook Contest shirebrook-contest
Own Choice from a Specified List
Shirebrook, Derbyshire Best soprano - Hucknall Excelsior. Best euphonium - Rotherham Borough. Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest - 1st(£1) Rotherham, 2nd (10s.) Lea Mills. 9 bands competed.
June 15, 2013, 8:14 p.m. July 25, 2016, 8:58 p.m.
